presets.title: List Page (Navigator Style)
presets.componentTree:
DocuSignShell
├── GlobalNav (globalNav slot prop)
├── LocalNav (localNav slot prop)
└── AgreementTableView
    ├── pageHeader={<PageHeader />}
    ├── filterBar={<FilterBar />}
    └── <DataTable columns={...} data={...} />
rules: Tables are NOT wrapped in Cards — render DataTable bare (Docusign convention).
FilterBar goes in the filterBar slot prop of AgreementTableView, NOT as a separate component.
DataTable is data-driven: NO children, use columns + data props.
PageHeader goes in the pageHeader slot prop of AgreementTableView.
GlobalNav and LocalNav are passed as slot prop objects to DocuSignShell, NOT as JSX children.
presets.codeSketch:
<DocuSignShell
  globalNav={globalNavConfig}
  localNav={localNavConfig}
>
  <AgreementTableView
    pageHeader={
      <PageHeader
        title="Agreements"
        actions={<Button>New Agreement</Button>}
      />
    }
    filterBar={
      <FilterBar
        search={{ placeholder: 'Search agreements...' }}
        quickActions={[{ label: 'Filter', onClick: () => {} }]}
      />
    }
  >
    <DataTable columns={columns} data={data} getRowKey={(row) => row.id} />
  </AgreementTableView>
</DocuSignShell>

showcaseConfig.globalNav:
const globalNavItems = [
  { id: 'home', label: 'Home' },
  { id: 'agreements', label: 'Agreements', active: true },
  { id: 'templates', label: 'Templates' },
  { id: 'reports', label: 'Reports' },
  { id: 'admin', label: 'Admin' },
];

presets.title: Dashboard (Full-Width, No Sidebar)
presets.componentTree:
DocuSignShell
├── GlobalNav (globalNav slot prop)
└── Stack (main content)
    ├── PageHeader
    ├── Grid (2-column card layout)
    │   ├── Card (stat/widget)
    │   ├── Card (stat/widget)
    │   └── ...
    └── Card (full-width chart/table)
rules: NO LocalNav sidebar — dashboards use full-width layout.
Use 2-column Grid for stat cards, full-width for tables/charts.
Each stat card: Card > Card.Body > Stack > Text(label) + Heading(value).
presets.codeSketch:
<DocuSignShell globalNav={globalNavConfig}>
  <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-300)">
    <PageHeader title="Dashboard" />
    <Grid columns={2} gap="var(--ink-spacing-300)">
      <Card>
        <Card.Body>
          <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)">
            <Text size="sm" variant="secondary">Total Agreements</Text>
            <Heading level={2}>1,234</Heading>
          </Stack>
        </Card.Body>
      </Card>
      {/* More stat cards */}
    </Grid>
  </Stack>
</DocuSignShell>

showcaseConfig.globalNav:

presets.title: Detail Page (Single Entity View)
presets.componentTree:
DocuSignShell
├── GlobalNav (globalNav slot prop)
└── Stack (main content)
    ├── Badge (status — ABOVE title)
    ├── Heading level={1} (entity name)
    ├── Text variant="secondary" (metadata)
    ├── Inline (action buttons)
    ├── Tabs (optional)
    └── Card(s) (content sections)
rules: NO LocalNav sidebar — detail pages use full-width layout.
Status badge goes ABOVE the title (Badge then Heading in a Stack).
Use Tabs for multi-section content (Details, History, Comments).
Action buttons (Edit, Send, Delete) go in an Inline row below the title.
presets.codeSketch:
<DocuSignShell globalNav={globalNavConfig}>
  <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-200)">
    <Badge variant="info">In Progress</Badge>
    <Heading level={1}>Agreement Name</Heading>
    <Text variant="secondary">Created Jan 15, 2025 · 3 recipients</Text>
    <Inline gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)">
      <Button>Edit</Button>
      <Button variant="secondary">Send</Button>
    </Inline>
    <Tabs>
      <Tabs.Panel label="Details">
        <Card><Card.Body>...</Card.Body></Card>
      </Tabs.Panel>
      <Tabs.Panel label="History">...</Tabs.Panel>
    </Tabs>
  </Stack>
</DocuSignShell>

presets.title: Settings Page (Form-Heavy with Sidebar)
presets.componentTree:
DocuSignShell
├── GlobalNav (globalNav slot prop)
├── LocalNav (settings sections as nav)
└── Stack (main content)
    ├── Heading level={1} (page title)
    ├── Card (form section 1)
    │   ├── Card.Header (section title)
    │   └── Card.Body > Stack > form fields
    └── Card (form section 2)
        ├── Card.Header
        └── Card.Body > Stack > form fields
rules: Use LocalNav sidebar with settings sections (General, Notifications, Security, etc.).
Each form section is a Card with Card.Header (section title) and Card.Body (fields).
Form fields stack vertically with --ink-spacing-200 gap.
Section headers use Heading level={2} (24px, weight 700).
Save/Cancel buttons go in an Inline at the bottom of each Card.
presets.codeSketch:
<DocuSignShell
  globalNav={globalNavConfig}
  localNav={localNavConfig}
>
  <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-300)">
    <Heading level={1}>Settings</Heading>
    <Card>
      <Card.Header>
        <Heading level={2}>General</Heading>
      </Card.Header>
      <Card.Body>
        <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-200)">
          <Input label="Display Name" />
          <Input label="Email" type="email" />
          <Select label="Language" options={[...]} />
          <Inline gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)">
            <Button>Save</Button>
            <Button variant="secondary">Cancel</Button>
          </Inline>
        </Stack>
      </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  </Stack>
</DocuSignShell>
